title: Hygienic Food Handling and Personal Hygiene Competency Strengthening: Self-Directed Learning Program Based on Interactive Video

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Understanding of Food Safety Concepts
context.additional_context: Collaborative enhancement environment through small-group learning and digital device utilization

learning_goals: Learners can perform hygienic food handling procedures with 90% accuracy.
Learners can comply with personal hygiene management standards at or above 85%.
Learners successfully complete PBL tasks for solving hygiene management issues at or above 80%.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
